Package de.fhe.ai.manager

Class TrafficManager

java.lang.Object
de.fhe.ai.manager.TrafficManager
public class TrafficManager
extends java.lang.Object
A class that actively manages traffic for the current tram network

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addLine​(Line line)
    Attempts to add a line to the lines managed by this traffic manager
    boolean addTemporaryLine​(TemporaryLine temporaryline)
    Attempts to add a temporary line to the temporary lines managed by this traffic manager

    Attempts to add a tram to the trams managed by this traffic manager

    Attempts to assign a tram to new lines that are added after all it's current lines

    java.util.List<Tram> getTramsInLine​(Line line)

    Works similar to #assignTram(Tram tram, Collection lines) but sends the tram directly to the new line

    • getInstance

      public static TrafficManager getInstance()

    • addLine

      public boolean addLine​(Line line)
      Attempts to add a line to the lines managed by this traffic manager
      Parameters:
      line - the line to add to the current lines
      Returns:
      true if the given line was not yet in the set and added successfully; otherwise false

    • removeLine

      public boolean removeLine​(Line line)
      Attempts to remove a line from the lines managed by this traffic manager
      Parameters:
      line - the line to add to the current lines
      Returns:
      true if the given line was in the set of current lines and removed succesfully; otherwise false

    • addTemporaryLine

      public boolean addTemporaryLine​(TemporaryLine temporaryline)
      Attempts to add a temporary line to the temporary lines managed by this traffic manager
      Parameters:
      temporaryline - the line to add to the current temporary lines
      Returns:
      true if the given temporary line was not yet in the set and added successfully lines; otherwise false

    • removeTemporaryLine

      public boolean removeTemporaryLine​(TemporaryLine temporaryLine)
      Attempts to remove a temporary line from the temporary lines managed by this traffic manager
      Parameters:
      temporaryLine - the line to add to the current temporary lines
      Returns:
      true if the given temporary line was in the set of temporary lines and removed succesfully lines; otherwise false

    • addTram

      public boolean addTram​(Tram tram)
      Attempts to add a tram to the trams managed by this traffic manager
      Parameters:
      tram - the line to add to the current trams
      Returns:
      true if the given tram was not yet in the set and added successfully; otherwise false

    • removeTram

      public boolean removeTram​(Tram tram)
      Attempts to remove a tram from the trams managed by this traffic manager
      Parameters:
      tram - the line to add to the current trams
      Returns:
      true if the given tram was in the set of trams and removed succesfully; otherwise false

    • assignTram

      public void assignTram​(Tram tram, java.util.Collection<Line> lines)
      Attempts to assign a tram to new lines that are added after all it's current lines
      Parameters:
      tram - the tram to assign
      lines - the lines to assign the tram to
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the lines paths are not directly traversable, that is that moving from destination1 to start2

    • reassignTram

      public void reassignTram​(Tram tram, TemporaryLine line)
      Works similar to #assignTram(Tram tram, Collection lines) but sends the tram directly to the new line
      Parameters:
      tram - the tram to reassign
      line - the line to assign the tram to
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the line paths are not directly traversable, that is that moving from destination1 to start2

    • unassignTram

      public void unassignTram​(Tram tram)
      Stops a tram at the current position without giving it any new lines
      Parameters:
      tram - the tram to unassign
